Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Parks and Recreation

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting smoking in pedestrian plazas and public parks and to repeal subdivision b of section 17-513 of the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a study regarding the prevention of second-hand smoke circulation in restaurants.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting smoking in pedestrian plazas and public parks.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Parks and Recreation

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting smoking in pedestrian plazas and public parks except for smoking areas within public parks, to repeal subdivision b of section 17-513 of the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a study regarding the prevention of second-hand smoke circulation in restaurants.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting smoking in pedestrian plazas and public parks except for smoking areas within public parks.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Jackson, Vacca, Brewer, Rodriguez, Recchia, Lander, Mark-Viverito, Dromm, Halloran and Gentile.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting smoking in pedestrian plazas and public parks and to repeal subdivision b of section 17-513 of the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a study regarding the prevention of second-hand smoke circulation in restaurants.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting smoking in pedestrian plazas and public parks.
